issue.title: [C++][Doc] Curate {{cpp/apidoc}}
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17548](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17548). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `cpp/apidoc` directory still contains a couple Markdown files, which were apparently forgotten and should be hopelessly outdated. We should simply remove them.
